snippet.title: Spooky Bonus - Official Video (new)
snippet.description:
Find out more from: http://www.greyaliengames.com/spookybonus/index.php
You can also buy the game on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/388450/

Uncover dark forces emanating from the heart of Old Town, and grab spooky accessories for your front yard makeover, too! You'll be spellbound by this adorably ghoulish horror-themed puzzle game.

Match shapes to stamp out evil and advance through Old Town, gathering gold and powerups as you go. Shop for yard decorations that boost your gameplay. Unleash exploding pumpkins, silver crosses, holy water, and more.

The time has come to unlock the sinister secret of Spooky Bonus. A blood curdling adventure awaits you!

Features:
- Smooth, enjoyable match-3 gameplay.
- Decorate your house and yard with spooky ornaments.
- Relaxed or Timed game modes.
- Gloriously ghoulish graphics.
- Can set backgrounds as Desktop Wallpaper (PC only.)
- 13 crazy bonus items from garlic bombs to silver bullets.
- Collect 6 multi-level powerup items.
- Play 100 unique levels.
- Specially-composed bloodcurdling music.
- This game is DRM-free!
